item.title: The Art of Video Game Music - Featuring Ben Zimmermann
item.description: Indie developers often underestimate the different skill sets required to make a game. Being a perfect game developer is comparable to being the avatar. You need to master (at least) the elements of programming, art, game design and music. Only when a game manages to have a perfect balance of these elements most people will actually enjoy it, otherwise your product will often suffer from a noticeable lack. The participation in game jams is often one of the best indicators for this inequality in the indie scene.
